# Blockchain

# Introduction

Blockchain is yet another crucial part of the "Industrial Revolution 4.0". Blockchain was invented by an anonymous entity know as Satoshi Nakamoto in 2018. However The original work that led to the creation of the Blockchain was started in 1991 by Staurt Haber and W. Scott Stornetta. This technology has significant implication for the way we live and do business today.

# What is a Blockchain?

Blockchain is a continuous list of records(blocks) which are linked and secured by cryptography. -wikipedia

# Advantages of the Blockchain

  1. Enhanced Security

  2. Increased Efficiency and Speed

  3. Reduced Cost

  4. Improved Traceability

  5. Increase Trust

# Practical Application of the Blockchain

  1. Healthcare

  2. Energy

  3. Law

  4. Governement

  5. Defense
